A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story felt more like a disposable TV episode. The Last Jedi betrays the original trilogy\, by cheating fans out of what could have been an amazing ride with Luke\, who in my opinion 'IS' Star Wars.  I was left with a sour taste in my mouth\, everything original fans knew and loved about the universe\, has been mercilessly snuffed out\, instead of cherished. This isn't Star Wars. Very disappointed.
